name: InfertilityFemale
title: Infertility, Female
description:
This value set provides a granular classification system for understanding the various reasons behind female infertility.
It can be used for research purposes, tracking infertility causes, and identifying potential areas for treatment interventions.
The comprehensive list allows for capturing a wide range of situations, while also including broader categories for less specific diagnoses.
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This value set focuses on various causes and classifications of infertility in females. It provides a comprehensive list of concepts encompassing factors contributing to a woman's inability to conceive.),(Data Element Scope: This data element captures the specific reasons or diagnoses associated with female infertility.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set incorporates a wide range of concepts related to female infertility:

Specific Causes: Identifies various factors contributing to infertility (e.g., tubal blockage, endometriosis, age-related decline).
General Categories: Includes broader categories like "female infertility of uterine origin" for situations where a specific cause is not identified.
History of Procedures: Captures relevant past surgeries or procedures that may impact fertility (e.g., hysterectomy, tubal ligation).
Infertility Classification: Differentiates between primary and secondary infertility.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set does not include male infertility factors.
It excludes details on specific infertility treatments or outcomes.)
